reg_info.full_title: O. Reg. 331/18: DEFINITION OF APPROVED DRUG SCREENING EQUIPMENT
reg_info.reg_name_text: DEFINITION OF APPROVED DRUG SCREENING EQUIPMENT

content.content: 1. For the purposes of sections 44.2, 48.0.2, 48.0.3 and 48.0.4 of the Act, “approved drug screening equipment” means drug screening equipment that is designed to ascertain the presence of a drug in a person’s body and that is prescribed by or approved under the Criminal Code (Canada).
content.raw_html:
1. For the purposes of sections 44.2, 48.0.2, 48.0.3 and 48.0.4 of the Act,

“approved drug screening equipment” means drug screening equipment that is designed to ascertain the presence of a drug in a person’s body and that is prescribed by or approved under the Criminal Code (Canada).

content.content: 2. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation).
content.raw_html: 2. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation).
